childMarkdownRemark.html:
While we provide raw data and aggregates, numerous press outlets and individual researchers and data scientists have created helpful visualizations to help make sense of the data.

  • Map: Watch the real-time spread of coronavirus in the U.S.
  • The New York Times — U.S. Lags in Coronavirus Testing After Slow Response to Outbreak by Larry Buchanan, K.K. Rebecca Lai and Allison McCann
  • Politico — Live tracker: How many coronavirus cases have been reported in each U.S. state? by Beatrice Jin.
  • Vox — America’s shamefully slow coronavirus testing threatens all of us by Christina Animashaun
  • Talking Points Memo — Progression of New Testing By Day by Josh Marshall
  • Our World in Data — How many tests for COVID-19 are being performed around the world? by Esteban Ortiz-Ospina
  • COVID-19 in US and Canada by 1Point3Acres
  • COVID-19 Charts by Daniel Gilbert
  • Covid19 Comparison by Robert Bracco
  • USA COVID19 Dashboard by Gabe O’Leary
  • COVID-19 Growth By State by Avy Faingezicht
  • U.S. COVID-19 Case Statistic Tracking by Eric Czech
  • Coronavirus USA Map by Peter James Walker
  • Timelapse of reported cases by Bradley Dickson
  • Estimating COVID-19 cases from US deaths by Luke Hewitt
  • US COVID-19 Growth by Kaiyu Hsu
  • Yiqin Fu
  • The U.S. COVID-19 Testing Gap by Lachlan Campbell
